description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy uses enhanced versions of his Devil Fruit techniques while in Nightmare form

abilityReveals.abilityName: Enhanced Gomu Gomu no Pistol (Nightmare Form)
abilityReveals.description: While in Nightmare Luffy form, the Gomu Gomu no Pistol is powerful enough to send Gecko Moria, a Warlord of the Sea, flying through the air.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Nightmare Luffy catches the fleeing Moria and punches him with devastating force.

abilityReveals.abilityName: Enhanced Gomu Gomu no Storm (Nightmare Form)
abilityReveals.description: The signature rapid-fire punch barrage is amplified by the power of 100 shadows, capable of sending the massive zombie Oars flying.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Nightmare Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Balloon to dodge, then untwists his body to unleash a devastating Storm attack on Oars.

abilityReveals.description: Nightmare Luffy effortlessly blocks Oars' Gomu Gomu no Rifle with a single hand, showcasing the dramatic strength increase.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Demonstrates the power gap between Nightmare Luffy and Oars who possesses a copy of Luffy's abilities.

strengths.strength: Techniques can be dramatically enhanced when combined with shadow absorption
strengths.description: The 100 shadows absorbed in Nightmare form multiply the power of Gomu Gomu techniques to devastating effect.

description: Allows the user to manifest and control shadows, steal them from others, and implant them into corpses to create zombies or living beings to enhance their strength.

users.circumstances: Moria uses his shadow manipulation abilities to defend against the Straw Hats and control Oars

abilityReveals.description: Moria's shadow can move independently to intercept attacks, as demonstrated when it catches and destroys the salt meant for Oars.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: When Usopp shoots salt into Oars' mouth, Moria's shadow catches it mid-air and throws it away, breaking the bag.

abilityReveals.description: The Kage Kage no Mi's power allows implanting multiple shadows into a single person, with Luffy containing 100 shadows to become Nightmare Luffy.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: The Rolling Pirates use shadows previously stolen by Moria to power up Luffy into his Nightmare form, though this is using shadows against Moria's will.

weaknesses.weakness: Shadows can be used against the user if freed from their control
